content: CFS-SP WB Water-based acrylic sealant spray High-durability joint sealant spray for general purpose applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Water-based, low-VOC, halogen-free formulation High degree of elasticity – movement capability of up to 50% Excellent sprayability and low slump characteristics Fast, efficient sealing of wide, difficult-to-access joints Quick and easy installation with airless sprayer can help save time and money Applications Sealing wall and top-of-wall openings and joints Sealing building perimeter gaps between floor slabs and exterior façades For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application temperature range: 39 - 104 °F Can be painted: Yes Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | LEED VOC | 34 g/l | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Gypsum, Steel, Metal | Application temperature range | 39 - 104 °F | Approx. cure time | 1.5 mm/day | 1 | Can be painted | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate | Volume per unit | 1153.3 in³ | Color | Red, White, Grey | at 75°F/24°C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 430802 - FS joint spray CFS-SP WB grey - Package Size 1 pc - 430792 - FS joint spray CFS-SP WB red - Package Size 1 pc - 3537998 - Firestop spray CFS-SP WB red (pallet) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x FS joint spray CFS-SP WB red - 2447526 - Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB red - Package Size 1 pc - 2447527 - Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB White - Package Size 1 pc - 2447528 - Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB Grey - Package Size 1 pc - 3961308 - 18 x CFS-SP WB (Red) (1 Pallet) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB red - 3961309 - 18 x CFS-SP WB (White) (1 Pallet) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB White - 3961310 - 18 x CFS-SP WB (Grey) (1 Pallet) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop joint spray CFS-SP WB Grey - 430793 - FS joint spray CFS-SP WB white - Package Size 1 pc
